TA0011.title: IP Providers
TA0011.description: In the gray/black market, IP providers are individuals or organizations specializing in providing fake, forged, or stolen IP addresses to hide network identities, evade blocks, conduct cyberattacks, or perform other malicious activities. These IP addresses may be used for fraudulent ad clicks, online scams, and malware distribution.

references.title: The Rotating IP Black Market Spawned by Online Fraud and Its Victims
